entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Grande-Quatre
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:27 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Haze, -28.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Grande IV Airport 12:57 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Haze
Temperature: -28.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: W 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. Temperature steady near minus 28.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 42.
